name: reversalOfUnpostedPORedistribution

testSteps.description: Given that I'm logged in to PreLogging page

children.description: When i open page from sidebar menu: {Accounts Payable,Pre-Registration,Pre-Logging}

testSteps.description: Then the 'Payment Information' form and its contents should show up
When I set the 'Supplier' to '45261'

exception.message:
Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of all elements located by By.xpath:  .//div[contains(@class, 'form-item')][span[text()='Supplier']]//div[contains(@class, 'Select-option')] | .//div[contains(@class, 'form-item')][span[contains(text(), 'Supplier')]]//div[contains(@class, 'Select-option')] (tried for 120 second(s) with 100 milliseconds interval)

testSteps.description: When I set the 'Invoice Number' to 'oG8O1odb7Q'
When I click the 'Continue' button
When I select the first Bank Account and click 'Submit' button if modal exist
When I set the 'Gross Amount' to '10000'
When I set the 'Payment Terms' to '40'
When I set the 'Tax Area' to 'KF1'
When I set the 'Tax Amount' to '1000'
When I set the 'Discount Available' to '1000'
When I click the 'Continue' button
Then the 'Preliminary Distribution Account' modal and its contents should show up
When I set the modal 'Description' to 'Test'
When I click on 'Continue' button from modal
Then the 'Invoice Pre registration successfully created' modal should show up
When I click on 'Exit' button from modal
Given that I'm logged in to 'GL Distribution Voucher Match' page
Then the 'GL Distribution' page and its contents should show up
When i set the batch number using the saved value
When I click on 'Search' button
When I click the 'GL Distribution' button from the first search result
Then the 'GL Distribution' form should show up
When I click 'Add Line' button
When I fill up 'GL Distribution' table form Account Number: '934000', Line Description: 'TEST', Cost Center: '1KAB400', AOE: '<null>', Line Ref: '<null>'
When I click on 'Save' button
Then the 'GL Distribution Successful Created' modal should show up
When i click on modal review button
Then the 'Voucher Entry Review' page and its contents should show up
When I click on 'Search' button
Then the 'Review Voucher' search result should show up
When I select the first voucher entry
Then the view entries button of the first voucher entry should be enabled
Then the edit button of the first voucher entry should be enabled
When i click on delete button of the first voucher entry
Then the voucher review delete voucher modal should show up
When i click on modal confirm button
Then the voucher successfully deleted notification should show up
When I click on 'Search' button
Then the 'Review Voucher' search result should be empty

title: Reversal of unposted PO redistribution
